synopsis:
The legendary anime "Condom Butler Goro" is back with the latest technology! The final episode of the previous work, a huge human condomic story depicting the world 5 years and 6 months after the death battle between Goro and Count Gom Sinai. The first and second parts are 5.6 hours long animation, but due to various reasons, only 56 seconds of each digest video will be released.

(Source: Official Website)
